title: 2021 Christmas event

properties.name: description
properties.value: The 2021 Christmas event was the Christmas holiday event that began on 16 December 2021 and ended on 5 January 2022.

content:
2021 Christmas event
Released 16 December 2021 (Update)
End date 5 January 2022 (Update)
Reward See below
Preceded by 2020 Christmas event
Succeeded by N/A

The 2021 Christmas event was the Christmas holiday event that began on 16 December 2021 and ended on 5 January 2022.

During the event, the player helped the Squire clean Sir Vyvin's armour by obtaining ingredients for a secret recipe. The player was then forced to search for missing items, solve riddles and build snowmen in order to obtain all the ingredients for the secret recipe. Only then could the Squire save himself from making the biggest accident, the likes of which has never been seen before!

The event began outside the White Knights' Castle inside of Falador. The holiday event icon displayed the location of the event on the world map and minimap. A spade was required for this event, which could be obtained while doing the event.

Starting location for the event

Contents

  • 1 Walkthrough
    • 1.1 Chocolate chips
    • 1.2 Cecilia's presents
    • 1.3 The snowmen
    • 1.4 Cleaning the armour
    • 1.5 Christmas festivities
  • 2 Rewards
  • 3 Transcript
  • 4 Gallery

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Speak to Squire outside the White Knights' Castle. He will tell you that his life is over. He has had an accident, the likes of which has never been seen before. The Squire will play the part of Santa for the grotto in the Falador Christmas Festival. In a rush to get things ready for the grotto, he put his Santa outfit in the wash together with Sir Vyvin's white armour and the armour has turned pink! Sir Vyvin needs his armour, and it needs to be white. If it can't be cleaned before the festival, the Squire will be fired from his job and thus have nowhere to go. Offer to help the Squire and help him clean the armour so that he can focus on other things. The Squire knows of a magical cleaning potion, it gets the stains out of anything and he needs a few items which can be combined using a secret recipe. Sadly, the Squire has none of the items. The Squire asks you to bring him three ingredients for the potion. A festive white wine, a festive cinnamon and a festive holly. The Squire notes them down on a paper that you can bring with you. He also notes some extra details to help you out and the notes should update as you go to keep track of things.

Chocolate chips[edit | edit source]

Searching for the chocolate chips.

Go south of the west Falador bank and speak to Herquin in the gem shop. Unfortunately he has run into a problem, Herquin is baking some gingerbread gnomes for the Falador Christmas Festival, however, he has run out of chocolate chips and none of the shops have them in stock. You offer to exchange some chocolate chips for some festive cinnamon. Herquin could only think of one thing. His good friend Larry's two children, Buoy and Gurl often come and visit him during the week. They always play south of his house and there is a nice grassy area with some bushes and trees to climb. Perhaps the chocolate chips are located there. Walk south of the gem shop and search the bushes until you find two chocolate chip bags. Return to Herquin and he will give you the Festive cinnamon in exchange for the two bags of chocolate chips.

Cecilia's presents[edit | edit source]

A map of Cecilia's present deliveries.

Cecilia, who is located on the bridge in Falador park, runs the secret Santa for the Falador Christmas Festival but it has all gone wrong. She has the presents but doesn't know whom to deliver them to. You will have to solve three riddles in order to deliver the three packages to the correct person.

  • The green present shall be delivered to the hairdresser, located north of the western Falador bank. The hairdresser will offer you a free haircut (this can complete a Falador Easy Diary task). Maplink
  • The blue present shall be delivered to Wyson the gardener, located in the eastern house in the Falador park. Maplink
  • The red present shall be delivered to Wayne, located in the chainmail shop south of the White Knights' Castle. Maplink

Return to Cecilia on the bridge in the Falador park and tell her that you have delivered the presents and she will give you the Festive holly.

The snowmen[edit | edit source]

Rolling snowballs for Buoy and Gurl.

Talk to Larry, located south of the Falador Party Room, and he will tell you that Gurl and Buoy want some help building their snowman. Talk to the children and they will explain what seems to be the issue. Return to Larry and tell him that you will help the children.

If you need a spade, there is one in a snowpile directly outside Larry's house, which can only be obtained after talking to him a second time confirming you will help the children.

Return to the children and dig at least 8 snow from the piles of snow around the children. Roll the snowballs to the correct size and place the snowball on the scuffed snow next to the children.

Buoy needs the following snowballs on the west scuffed snow in the following order:

  • Small snowball
  • Big snowball
  • Huge snowball

Gurl needs the following snowballs on the east scuffed snow in the following order:

  • Humongous snowball
  • Large snowball
  • Normal snowball
  • Big snowball
  • Little snowball

Once you have placed all the snowballs on the scuffed snow, you can talk to the children and then return to Larry and he will give you Festive white wine.

Cleaning the armour[edit | edit source]

Return to the White Knight's Castle and talk to the Squire. He will tell you the secret recipe, mixing the three ingredients on each other to make the magical cleaning potion. Either use the festive cinnamon on the festive white wine to mix it or incorrectly use the festive holly on the festive white wine for a humorous dialogue. Either way will work.

Christmas is saved once more!

Talk to the Squire once again and he will give you a set of pink stained armour. Use the magical cleaning potion on the three armour pieces and then speak to the Squire. He will now tell you to talk to Sir Vyvin, he lives in the White Knights' Castle in Falador in the eastern part of the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US]. Talk to Sir Vyvin and give him the clean armour.

Christmas festivities[edit | edit source]

Return to the Squire and he thanks you for the help. He invites you to the Christmas festivities located west of the eastern Falador bank. There you can talk to any of the NPCs. In order to complete the Christmas event, you talk to Cecilia south of Falador park near the Grotto. A cutscene will start and Santa will give you a big present which will give you the rewards.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Festive elf hat
  • Festive elf slippers
  • Snowman ring
  • Secret santa present
    • The present can be re-coloured by speaking to the following NPCs:
      • Bob - South of Lumbridge (Bob's Brilliant Axes)
      • Aggie - Draynor village
      • Benny - Varrock's fountain square
      • Malignius Mortifer - South of Falador, between Port Sarim and the Crafting guild
  • Two partyhat sets
  • Two Santa hats
  • Two Christmas crackers
  • Winter holiday music tracks (from previous events)
  • Other rewards from previous events, which can be claimed by speaking to Diango.
  • Access to sled racing

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on an event has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the event.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

See 2021 Christmas event/Gallery for graphical variants that were used during the event.

  • Western Falador decorated for the event.

  • Eastern Falador decorated for the event.

  • The Christmas tree and Santa's throne.

  • Festive ducks and swans in the castle moat.

  • Map of Falador during the event.

The '''2021 Christmas event''' was the Christmas holiday event that began on 16 December 2021 and ended on 5 January 2022.

During the event, the player helped the [[Squire]] clean [[Sir Vyvin]]'s armour by obtaining ingredients for a secret recipe. The player was then forced to search for missing items, solve riddles and build snowmen in order to obtain all the ingredients for the secret recipe. Only then could the Squire save himself from making the biggest accident, the likes of which has never been seen before!

The event began outside the [[White Knights' Castle]] inside of [[Falador]]. The holiday event [[icon]] [[File:Holiday event icon.png]] displayed the location of the event on the [[world map]] and [[minimap]]. A [[spade]] was required for this event, which could be obtained while doing the event.

[[File:2021 Christmas event location.png|thumb|left|250px|Starting location for the event]]

==Walkthrough==
[[File:Squire (Christmas) chathead.png|left]]
Speak to [[Squire (2021 Christmas event)|Squire]] outside the [[White Knights' Castle]]. He will tell you that his life is over. He has had an accident, the likes of which has never been seen before. The Squire will play the part of [[Santa]] for the grotto in the [[Falador]] Christmas Festival. In a rush to get things ready for the grotto, he put his Santa outfit in the wash together with [[Sir Vyvin]]'s white armour and the armour has turned pink! Sir Vyvin needs his armour, and it needs to be white. If it can't be cleaned before the festival, the Squire will be fired from his job and thus have nowhere to go. Offer to help the Squire and help him clean the armour so that he can focus on other things. The Squire knows of a [[magical cleaning potion]], it gets the stains out of anything and he needs a few items which can be combined using a secret recipe. Sadly, the Squire has none of the items. The Squire asks you to bring him three ingredients for the potion. A [[festive white wine]], a [[festive cinnamon]] and a [[festive holly]]. The Squire notes them down on a paper that you can bring with you. He also notes some extra details to help you out and the notes should update as you go to keep track of things.

===Chocolate chips===
[[File:2021 Christmas bushes.png|thumb|Searching for the chocolate chips.]]
[[File:Herquin chathead.png|left]]
Go south of the west Falador bank and speak to [[Herquin]] in the gem shop. Unfortunately he has run into a problem, Herquin is baking some gingerbread gnomes for the Falador Christmas Festival, however, he has run out of chocolate chips and none of the shops have them in stock. You offer to exchange some chocolate chips for some festive cinnamon. Herquin could only think of one thing. His good friend Larry's two children, Buoy and Gurl often come and visit him during the week. They always play south of his house and there is a nice grassy area with some bushes and trees to climb. Perhaps the chocolate chips are located there. Walk south of the gem shop and search the bushes until you find two chocolate chip bags. Return to Herquin and he will give you the Festive cinnamon in exchange for the two bags of chocolate chips.

===Cecilia's presents===
[[File:Cecilia chathead.png|left]]
{{Map|zoom=1|x=3000|y=3353|width=300|align=right|group=Presents|caption=A map of Cecilia's present deliveries.}}
[[Cecilia]], who is located on the bridge in Falador park, runs the secret Santa for the Falador Christmas Festival but it has all gone wrong. She has the [[Secret santa present (2021 Christmas event)|presents]] but doesn't know whom to deliver them to. You will have to solve three riddles in order to deliver the three packages to the correct person.

{{clear|left}}
* The green present shall be delivered to the [[hairdresser]], located north of the western Falador bank. The hairdresser will offer you a free haircut (this can complete a [[Falador Easy Diary]] task). {{Map|type=maplink|2945,3380,title:[[Hairdresser]]|mtype=pin|group=Presents|icon=greenPin}}
* The blue present shall be delivered to [[Wyson the gardener]], located in the eastern house in the Falador park. {{Map|type=maplink|3027,3378,title:[[Wyson the gardener]]|mtype=pin|group=Presents|icon=bluePin}}
* The red present shall be delivered to [[Wayne]], located in the [[Wayne's Chains! - Chainmail specialist.|chainmail shop]] south of the White Knights' Castle. {{Map|type=maplink|2973,3311,title:[[Wayne]]|mtype=pin|group=Presents|icon=redPin}}

Return to Cecilia on the bridge in the Falador park and tell her that you have delivered the presents and she will give you the Festive holly.

===The snowmen===
[[File:Larry (Mahogany Homes) chathead.png|left]]
[[File:2021 Christmas snowmen.png|thumb|Rolling snowballs for Buoy and Gurl.]]
Talk to [[Larry (Mahogany Homes)|Larry]], located south of the [[Falador Party Room]], and he will tell you that [[Gurl]] and [[Buoy]] want some help building their [[Snowman (2021 Christmas event)|snowman]]. Talk to the children and they will explain what seems to be the issue. Return to Larry and tell him that you will help the children.

If you need a [[spade]], there is one in a snowpile directly outside [[Larry (Mahogany Homes)|Larry]]'s house, which can only be obtained after talking to him a second time confirming you will help the children.

Return to the children and dig at least 8 [[snow]] from the piles of snow around the children. Roll the snowballs to the correct size and place the snowball on the [[scuffed snow]] next to the children.

Buoy needs the following snowballs on the west scuffed snow in the following order:
* [[Small snowball]]
* [[Big snowball]]
* [[Huge snowball]]

Gurl needs the following snowballs on the east scuffed snow in the following order:
* [[Humongous snowball]]
* [[Large snowball]]
* [[Normal snowball]]
* [[Big snowball]]
* [[Little snowball]]

Once you have placed all the snowballs on the scuffed snow, you can talk to the children and then return to Larry and he will give you Festive white wine.

===Cleaning the armour===
Return to the [[White Knight's Castle]] and talk to the [[Squire]]. He will tell you the secret recipe, mixing the three ingredients on each other to make the magical cleaning potion. Either use the festive cinnamon on the festive white wine to mix it or incorrectly use the festive holly on the festive white wine for a humorous dialogue. Either way will work.

[[File:2021 Christmas event cutscene.png|thumb|Christmas is saved once more!]]
Talk to the Squire once again and he will give you a set of pink stained armour. Use the magical cleaning potion on the three armour pieces and then speak to the Squire. He will now tell you to talk to [[Sir Vyvin]], he lives in the White Knights' Castle in Falador in the eastern part of the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}}. Talk to Sir Vyvin and give him the clean armour.

===Christmas festivities===
Return to the Squire and he thanks you for the help. He invites you to the Christmas festivities located west of the eastern Falador bank. There you can talk to any of the NPCs. In order to complete the Christmas event, you talk to [[Cecilia]] south of Falador park near the Grotto. A cutscene will start and Santa will give you [[a big present]] which will give you the rewards.

==Rewards==
[[File:2021 Christmas event reward scroll.png|center]]

*[[Festive elf hat]]
*[[Festive elf slippers]] 
*[[Snowman ring]]
*[[Secret santa present]]
**The present can be re-coloured by speaking to the following NPCs:
***[[Bob]] - South of Lumbridge [[Bob's Brilliant Axes.|(Bob's Brilliant Axes)]]
***[[Aggie]] - Draynor village
***[[Benny]] - Varrock's fountain square
***[[Malignius Mortifer]] - South of Falador, between Port Sarim and the Crafting guild
*Two [[partyhat set]]s
*Two [[Santa hat]]s
*Two [[Christmas cracker]]s
*Winter holiday music tracks (from previous events)
*Other rewards from previous events, which can be claimed by speaking to [[Diango]].
*Access to [[Scrubfoot's cave|sled racing]]
